extends PokeSceneWithHeaderAndBackButton
    Scene related to the catch of pokemon.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CatchEmAll

        public CatchEmAll()
        Constructor. Calls a series of function in order to create the Node needed to set the scene up. It also sets the music.

    • Method Detail

      • displayTitle

        private void displayTitle()
        Add the Title to the scene.

      • displaySelectPokemon

        private void displaySelectPokemon()
        Add a CatchEmAllTextField for selecting the pokemon the user wants to catch.

      • displaySelectSlot

        private void displaySelectSlot()
        Add a ChooseSlotNumber for selecting the slot in which the pokemon will be put if captured

      • displaySelectedPokemon

        private void displaySelectedPokemon()
        Add a BackgroundImage to the scene, displaying the portrait of the pokemon selected. In case no pokemon is selected

      • displayOdd

        private void displayOdd()
        Add a FieldRelatedLabel displaying the odd related to the pokemon selected. In case no pokemon is selected, it just tells "Odd:".

      • displayTryToCatch

        private void displayTryToCatch()
        Add to the scene a RegularButton saying "TRY TO CATCH". Clicking on it will try to catch the pokemon selected. If no pokemon is selected or the number of pokeballs is zero, nothing happens.

      • displayResultLabel

        private void displayResultLabel()
        Add to the scene an invisible label, that will be used to display the result of the catch

      • displayFavoritePokemons

        private void displayFavoritePokemons()
        Add to the scene a scrollpane with a list of all the favorite pokemon of the user

      • loadPokemonInfoByName

        private void loadPokemonInfoByName(java.lang.String pokemonName)
        Check if the pokemon in input exits, if so it formats the scene adding the information (image and odd) of the pokemon selected
        Parameters:
        pokemonName - name of a possible existing pokemon

      • tryToCatchAction

        private void tryToCatchAction()
        Triggered when the user try to catch a Pokemon. Checks if a pokemon is selected and then calculate if it's capture or not
